author: mmarionncern
body:
The code for the PF hadron cluster claibration is udpated for the 73X/74X calibration process.
This minor change concerns the handling of pseudorapidity dependency for hadrons reconstructed only with HCAL rechits -> no correction really needed.

The calibration laws hardcoded have been also updated and are now consistent with the one that will be uploaded within the next ours in the database.

According to the discussion with PPD and AlcaDB people ( Monday, Jan. 26), this updated calibration goes into 73X and 74X
title: update the PF hadron calibration code for 73X/74X
